synopsis.text: An enchanting tale unfolds in a serene kappa village, where young Kawatarou and his beloved companion reside among their fellow kappa. Based on the beloved children's comic by renowned manga artist Kon Shimizu, this heartwarming anime follows the duo's journey to save their village from the brink of starvation. When a devastating storm wreaks havoc during festival preparations and depletes the river of fish, the village's primary food source, Kawatarou and his girlfriend embark on a courageous quest through the mountains to find sustenance and restore prosperity to their once-thriving community. Will they succeed in their mission and bring hope back to their people? Join Kawatarou on this captivating adventure, filled with friendship, determination, and the power of community.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
